COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa2
STRING: [Phorni] “Chris, she'll be here soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm...? 'Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x160
STRING: [Phorni] “Don't ‘'morning’ me! It's already time for Torta
to be here!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180
STRING: [Chris] “Is it noon already...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b2
STRING: [Phorni] “It's after eleven thirty.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c8
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... She said she'd come in the early
afternoon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fa
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm sure Torta will come after twelve, not after
one.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a
STRING: [Chris] “You really do know her. You're correct.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x230
STRING: I got up quickly while being careful not to knock Phorni
over on the pillow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x246
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, I guess I'll take a shower first.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x264
STRING: [Phorni] “Yeah, hurry up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27a
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d4
STRING: I took a quick shower and walked back into the room,
wiping my hair with a towel...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30e
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, 'morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x340
STRING: [Phorni] “Torta's here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x364
STRING: [Chris] “How did you...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x396
STRING: [Torta] “Didn't you leave the door unlocked for me...?
Oh, did you forget to lock it? That's dangerous.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b6
STRING: [Chris] “No...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cc
STRING: Did I really forget to lock it?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f4
STRING: [Phorni] “I unlocked it before Torta got here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x40a
STRING: I bumped Phorni's head lightly with a finger as she
stood on the table with her chest proudly puffed out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x444
STRING: [Phorni] “Ow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x468
STRING: [Chris] “Well, it's lucky I forgot to lock it. I'm glad you
didn't have to wait in the cold.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a4
STRING: [Torta] “Really lucky.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ba
STRING: [Chris] “But aren't you early?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d0
STRING: It was only just past twelve o'clock.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f8
STRING: [Torta] “It's after twelve o'clock, isn't it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50e
STRING: [Chris] “I'll ask just in case... What time did you get
here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x540
STRING: [Torta] “Twelve-oh-one.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x556
STRING: [Chris] “Wouldn't you just say exactly twelve?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x588
STRING: [Torta] “No, I wouldn't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x59e
STRING: [Chris] “Yes you would.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d0
STRING: [Torta] “I wouldn't say it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5e6
STRING: [Chris] “Right...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x618
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, let's practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x62e
STRING: Torta said this in her normal tone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x63a
STRING: I was hoping she'd realize the situation and say
something, but it was probably impossible.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x650
STRING: [Chris] “I just woke up...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x682
STRING: [Torta] “You took a shower, so I'm sure you're awake
now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x698
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, fine... Did you eat lunch?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ca
STRING: [Torta] “Not really. But isn't it breakfast for you, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ea
STRING: [Chris] “That's the plan... What do you want to do,
Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x712
STRING: [Torta] “I'd be fine until the evening if I had to be.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x728
STRING: [Chris] “Then... Should I make something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x75a
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x770
STRING: [Chris] “It'd be easier for me than just practicing right
away. Though I can only make simple stuff, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ac
STRING: [Torta] “Yay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c2
STRING: I had taken a shower, but I wasn't totally awake yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d8
STRING: I wanted to take it a little easier on my day off, so all I
could think to do was make something simple.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ee
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, sit down and wait for a bit.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x80c
STRING: [Torta] “Yes, sir.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x830
STRING: Torta sat in a chair and Phorni watched happily from in
front of her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84e
STRING: [Phorni] “Long time no see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x864
STRING: Phorni talked earnestly to Torta, moving her wings
restlessly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x87a
STRING: Well... I didn't mind what she did as long as she didn't
get caught.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x890
STRING: [Chris] “Now then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b8
STRING: I went to the kitchen, got the espresso maker, called a
macchinetta, ready and boiled some water to warm up
the cups.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d8
STRING: I put a filter filled with coffee grinds in the top, and put
water in the bottom.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ee
STRING: The coffee would be made just like that, so I put some
milk in the attached container in the meantime, and
mixed it briskly until it foamed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x90e
STRING: With just a little bit of work, even simple cooking could
be quite something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x924
STRING: Arietta taught me almost all of this knowledge, and it
was useful while living alone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x93a
STRING: [Chris] “Next...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x950
STRING: I put some rusks I had bought on a plate, and got out
some hazelnut chocolate spread that Torta liked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x966
STRING: Around the time a good smell was coming from the
espresso maker, the water was boiling and I warmed
the cups with it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x97c
STRING: In the morning on my days off, though it was actually
afternoon for me, I just ate what I wanted. It was a
breakfast that couldn't really be called cooking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x992
STRING: I mixed the brewed coffee with the frothy milk in a one
to three ratio, and made cafe latte.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a8
STRING: The whole thing took less than ten minutes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ce
STRING: [Chris] “It's ready. Can you help me carry it to the
table?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ec
STRING: [Phorni] “Nope.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa02
STRING: I knew that...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa0e
STRING: [Chris] “Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa2c
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? Yeah, I'm coming.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa5a
STRING: Torta came to the kitchen, and we carried out the cups
and plates together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa8c
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, that looks good. And there's chocolate
spread.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa2
STRING: [Chris] “You always said you liked it, Torta, so I bought
some and liked it, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xade
STRING: [Torta] “I see. That's good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf4
STRING: It was a little early for me, but I thought I could eat this
much. I knew I'd regret it if I practiced without eating
anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb14
STRING: [Chris] “Help yourself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb46
STRING: [Torta] “Mm, don't mind if I do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb78
STRING: [Phorni] “This is kind of nice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb8e
STRING: Just as Torta spoke, she spread some chocolate on a
rusk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba4
STRING: While she was engrossed in that, I looked at Phorni
surreptitiously.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbd6
STRING: [Phorni] “Hurry up and plaaayy. I'm booorreed.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbec
STRING: Phorni just wouldn't understand how I felt, and even
though I couldn't answer, she said this over and over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc02
STRING: [Chris] “So, let's start practicing as soon as we're done
eating.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc34
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm? Why are you stating the obvious.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc5e
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, just to make sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc90
STRING: [Torta] “That's weird.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc2
STRING: [Phorni] “That's weird.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcdc
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf2
STRING: Who did she think I was explaining to?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcfe
STRING: I glared lightly at Phorni so as to not be seen by Torta,
who was still lost in her chocolate.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd14
STRING: Phorni went so far as to yawn, as if she didn't notice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd2a
STRING: It seemed she was preoccupied with ignoring me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd52
STRING: [Torta] “Thanks for the food.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd68
STRING: Torta placed her cup on the table, and said this
contentedly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd90
STRING: [Phorni] “Finally.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc2
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, let's start practicing soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd8
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... I'll be ready in a second.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdee
STRING: When we finally finished eating, Phorni rolled around on
the desk, kicking her legs in a show of dissatisfaction
only I could see.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe22
STRING: But when she heard Torta's voice, Phorni jumped up
and pointed to her regular seat on top of the Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe40
STRING: [Torta] “I warmed up my voice at home, so I'm pretty
much ready.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe68
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm ready any time, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe8c
STRING: I picked Phorni up casually between two fingers and sat
in front of the Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea2
STRING: [Chris] “Then let's begin.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xecc
STRING: I opened the sheet music, and focused.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed8
STRING: I met Torta's gaze, and pressed the keys.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf34
STRING: Our practice that day was kind of fun.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf40
STRING: When Phorni suddenly started to sing, I thought she'd
be a distraction, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf56
STRING: Phorni's voice harmonized beautifully with Torta's,
making a new sound.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf6c
STRING: It was too bad I was the only one who could hear it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf94
STRING: [Phorni] “What!? You're already done?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfaa
STRING: [Chris] “You're tired, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfdc
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, yeah. I guess I am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff2
STRING: [Chris] “That's enough for today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1034
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah. It was kind of different than usual today, it
was really good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1054
STRING: [Chris] “Different...? Like what you were saying before
about the sound changing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a0
STRING: [Torta] “No... It was something different again today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b6
STRING: [Chris] “I just don't get it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e8
STRING: [Torta] “Forget about it. Anyway, Arie's letter will come
today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1108
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. It's probably already here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x113a
STRING: [Torta] “Why don't you go get it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1150
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? I'll get it after you leave, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1182
STRING: [Torta] “Why? You can just get it now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1198
STRING: [Chris] “I don't mind getting it...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ca
STRING: [Torta] “Then go ahead.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e0
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, I'll be back soon, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1212
STRING: [Torta] “Have a nice trip.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1234
STRING: Still not understanding, I walked to the first floor
mailbox.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1240
STRING: Arie's letter was already there as expected, so I
retrieved it and went back.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x126e
STRING: [Chris] “I'm back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a0
STRING: [Torta] “Was the letter there?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b6
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12cc
STRING: I came back to the room and put the letter in the
drawer without opening it, like I usually did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12fe
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? Aren't you going to read it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1314
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah I'm going to read it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1332
STRING: [Torta] “Then why did you put it away?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1348
STRING: [Chris] “Because I'll read it later, of course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x137a
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? You can just read it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1390
STRING: [Chris] “What...? I don't usually read letters in front of
people.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c2
STRING: [Torta] “It's okay, I won't look.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13d8
STRING: [Chris] “Then why are you trying to make me read it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x140a
STRING: [Torta] “I was just thinking you should read it quickly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1420
STRING: [Chris] “There's plenty of time before tomorrow
morning... And more to the point, I feel like there's
something else to this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x145c
STRING: [Torta] “Umm... No, I was just wondering what kind of
face you make when reading her letters, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x147c
STRING: [Chris] “No particular face, just a normal face.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ae
STRING: [Phorni] “You always smile.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14f0
STRING: [Phorni] “Like this!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1522
STRING: [Torta] “Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1538
STRING: [Chris] “Apparently.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1550
STRING: Looking slightly dissatisfied, Torta walked over to the
drawer I had just shut, and opened it without asking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1566
STRING: [Chris] “Ah, don't do that!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1598
STRING: [Torta] “It's okay, right? I'm not doing any harm.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ae
STRING: Saying this, Torta took the letter out of the drawer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15d6
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? These are all letters under here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ec
STRING: [Chris] “Yes... So don't look.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x161e
STRING: [Torta] “I can't look?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1634
STRING: [Chris] “You get letters from Arie, right Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1666
STRING: [Torta] “That's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x167c
STRING: [Chris] “I'm sure these are no different. She just writes
about recent events, and what she's doing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b8
STRING: [Torta] “But... You keep them so carefully.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ce
STRING: [Chris] “Well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1700
STRING: [Torta] “Aww, I wanted to see your smiling face, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1716
STRING: [Chris] “I don't smile...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1748
STRING: [Phorni] “You're such a liar.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1788
STRING: [Chris] “Regardless, I'll read the letter and write a reply
after you leave, Torta, so don't worry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17c4
STRING: [Torta] “Guess I don't have a choice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17ee
STRING: [Chris] “So, what do you want to do now? Do you want
to go get something to eat?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180c
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah. That would be fine, or you could make
something, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x182c
STRING: [Chris] “Are you as bad at cooking as always, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x185e
STRING: [Torta] “I just don't think it's for me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1874
STRING: [Chris] “Even though Arie is so good at it. Why don't you
try practicing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1892
STRING: [Torta] “I have been...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18a8
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, I see. So do you want to try cooking?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18da
STRING: [Torta] “You're teasing me now...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18f0
STRING: [Chris] “I didn't mean to. The fact that you heard it like
that is proof you have no confidence.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192c
STRING: [Torta] “I don't mind. If you say you really want to eat
my cooking, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x194c
STRING: [Chris] “You'll eat it, too, right Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x196a
STRING: [Torta] “I won't eat it. Of course not.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1980
STRING: [Chris] “I'll ask just in case, but you've gotten better
since coming here, right? Ninna is good at cooking,
after all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19c6
STRING: [Torta] “I suppose that's entirely possible and not
possible at the same time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19dc
STRING: [Chris] “...A non-answer if I ever heard one.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a0e
STRING: [Torta] “That's why you should cook, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a24
STRING: [Chris] “But... I can only really make simple things. If we
eat out, I found a good place recently.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a6a
STRING: [Torta] “A good place?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a80
STRING: [Chris] “Asino brought me there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a9e
STRING: [Torta] “Asino did? Is it... Is it that trattoria?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ab4
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, that's it. Do you know it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ae6
STRING: [Torta] “Uh-uh, but I think Asino mentioned it when I
was talking to him.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b06
STRING: [Chris] “That's rare. I didn't know you two talked.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b24
STRING: [Torta] “Well, just when I see him at school or around.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b3a
STRING: [Chris] “About the trattoria, it's pretty cheap, too. So
how about it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b6c
STRING: [Torta] “I'll pass... I'd rather eat your cooking, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b8c
STRING: [Chris] “I can only make something simple like always,
you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1baa
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, that's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bc0
STRING: [Chris] “＊sigh＊ Even though there's a girl at my house,
I'm the one cooking.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bfc
STRING: [Torta] “I'll show you someday...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c12
STRING: [Chris] “Can you not whisper scary things like that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c44
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, you heard that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c5a
STRING: [Chris] “You definitely said that so I could hear it...
Anyway, just kill some time while you wait.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c96
STRING: [Torta] “Yes, sir.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cd6
STRING: Phorni must have been holding a grudge for me
bumping her twice earlier, as she was swinging her legs
over the edge of the table in annoyance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d00
STRING: I casually picked her up by her back and brought her
into the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d18
STRING: When I decided Torta couldn't hear me, I spoke to
Phorni in a quiet voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d2e
STRING: [Chris] “Did that hurt...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d60
STRING: [Phorni] “It hurt.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d76
STRING: [Chris] “You shouldn't say those kinds of things, you
know, Phorni?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da8
STRING: [Phorni] “I wasn't bad.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dbe
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, I don't smile, do I?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ddc
STRING: [Phorni] “Liar! You're always grinning when you say ‘Arie.’”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e18
STRING: [Chris] “Now you're lying.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e4a
STRING: [Phorni] “Th-That hurts! Well, the last part was a lie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e60
STRING: [Chris] “If you keep saying things like that, I won't
believe you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e88
STRING: [Torta] “Did you call me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eb2
STRING: [Chris] “I didn't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ed0
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? You said something, didn't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ee6
STRING: [Chris] “I was just going over ingredients out loud. You
always fail because you don't measure properly, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f0e
STRING: [Torta] “Shut uuuup.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f40
STRING: [Phorni] “Ingredients. That's a bad excuse.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f56
STRING: [Chris] “I wonder whose fault it is that I had to make
that excuse.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f92
STRING: [Phorni] “It's your fault.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fa8
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, that reminds me, I am talking to the
ingredients here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fc8
STRING: I picked her up with my fingers and held her over the
pot for pasta I had set out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ff0
STRING: [Phorni] “Whoa! Hey, I don't taste good!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2006
STRING: [Chris] “I've never tried you, so I wouldn't know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2038
STRING: [Phorni] “Whoa!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x204e
STRING: [Chris] “So will you wait quietly?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x206c
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay I get it!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2096
STRING: I brought Phorni back to the table just like that, picked
up the alarm clock, and returned to the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ba
STRING: Something simple but tasty would be good.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20c6
STRING: I had already decided to make pasta; now all I needed
were the ingredients.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20dc
STRING: I thought something like Aglio Olio di Pepperoncini
would be safe.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20f2
STRING: I took the olive oil with garlic soaking in it from the
shelf, and actually checked the ingredients this time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x214c
STRING: [Torta] “Isn't that too much garlic?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2162
STRING: I was waiting for her to say it was good, so those words
surprised me slightly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2178
STRING: I tried it myself and, well, I suppose it was more than
normal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x218e
STRING: [Chris] “I guess. It might be more than what you usually
get at a restaurant. But... Isn't this better?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21b6
STRING: [Torta] “It is good...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21cc
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, well that's good, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21fe
STRING: [Torta] “Even though you're eating with a girl.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2214
STRING: [Chris] “I don't think I have to worry about that with you,
Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2246
STRING: [Torta] “That may be true, but I kind of feel like you're
looking down on me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x225c
STRING: [Chris] “That's not what I meant.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x228e
STRING: [Torta] “Well, you did make the same thing when Arie
came.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22ae
STRING: [Chris] “What did she say in her letter?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22e0
STRING: [Torta] “What? Oh what was it? It was last year, I
forgot.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2300
STRING: [Chris] “That means it was nothing special, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2332
STRING: [Torta] “I said I forgot.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2348
STRING: [Chris] “If... If that's the case, then fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x237a
STRING: [Torta] “Oh... Right. She said you didn't even kiss her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23b6
STRING: [Phorni] “Ah-ha-ha!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23cc
STRING: [Chris] “Kkhh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23e2
STRING: I almost shot pasta out of my nose.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23ee
STRING: Even Phorni, listening grumpily to our conversation,
laughed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2412
STRING: [Chris] “How much did she write...? I know you're her
little sister, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x244e
STRING: [Torta] “I wouldn't have said it if you hadn't asked, Chris.
You deserved it. I'm sure your letters have things you
can't tell me about, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2478
STRING: [Chris] “No they don't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24aa
STRING: [Torta] “Really? Then show me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24c0
STRING: [Chris] “Ummm.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24f2
STRING: [Torta] “Ah-ha-ha, I'm kidding. I have an idea what Arie
would write.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2512
STRING: [Chris] “No, you may be twins, but you're very different.
Writing skills aren't based on genetics.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x254e
STRING: [Torta] “So... I take it you're making a fool of me now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2564
STRING: [Chris] “No. I mean that you have your good points, too,
Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25a0
STRING: [Phorni] “You're such a liar.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25d2
STRING: [Torta] “That sounds like a lie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25e8
STRING: [Chris] “Listen... It doesn't matter, so let's hurry and eat.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x261a
STRING: [Torta] “We'll talk about that later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x267e
STRING: [Torta] “I'll go home soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2694
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, it's late so I'll walk you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26c6
STRING: [Torta] “It's okay. Why don't you save that kind of thing
for Arie?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26dc
STRING: [Chris] “Shut up. I'm walking you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x270e
STRING: [Torta] “Fine...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2748
STRING: The night got late, and I walked the girl home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2754
STRING: That would be the easiest way to explain the situation I
was currently in.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x276a
STRING: But my situation was a little more complicated. I
couldn't simply be happy, but I couldn't avoid it, either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x278a
STRING: Even though I was the one who suggested it, I was
being very careful of what I said as I walked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27a0
STRING: There were few words, only the sound of the rain
echoed in my ears.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27c8
STRING: [Torta] “Hey... Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27de
STRING: Torta suddenly stopped under a street light and
murmured.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27ea
STRING: [Chris] “What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2808
STRING: [Torta] “Do you plan on just making me your partner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x281e
STRING: It was a question that could have come at any time, but
never had.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x282a
STRING: She asked me seriously, so I had to answer her just as
seriously.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2840
STRING: Plus, I thought I needed to answer simply and plainly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2894
STRING: [Chris] “I do...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28aa
STRING: I wavered for a very short time, then answered.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28d2
STRING: [Torta] “I phrased it badly... Can you decide here and
now? Partnering with me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28f2
STRING: [Chris] “I can decide... That's what I meant when I said
it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x291c
STRING: I thought seriously when I answered this question.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2928
STRING: I had thought many times about whether or not to
make her my partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x293e
STRING: All I had done was put the result of that thinking into
words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2952
STRING: [Torta] “Really...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2968
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2986
STRING: [Torta] “That's...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x299c
STRING: For whom...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29a8
STRING: Seeming to want so much to hear this, Torta looked up
at me, and stopped speaking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29be
STRING: I answered to fill the silence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29ca
STRING: [Chris] “For myself. Is that bad?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29f4
STRING: And also for Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a00
STRING: If I were to add one thing, I'm sure I would have said
that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a16
STRING: But I felt it was best not to say those words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a22
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a38
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a4e
STRING: Recently, silences like this had often occurred between
us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a64
STRING: I also needed the time to think.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a70
STRING: And in the end, I had chosen Torta right at that
moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2aa2
STRING: [Torta] “Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ab8
STRING: Torta murmured in a small voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ac4
STRING: I didn't ask her to repeat herself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ad0
STRING: [Chris] “I'm happy... To have you as my partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b02
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b24
STRING: In the end, those were the only words we exchanged.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b30
STRING: Torta didn't say bye, or see you tomorrow, or anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b3c
STRING: I watched Torta walking until she was very near her
house on the other side of the street; then I looked up
at the sky.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b62
STRING: I still had doubts.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b6e
STRING: Though I was sure that at least I wouldn't regret this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b7a
STRING: No matter the result.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b86
STRING: I had chosen her for myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bac
STRING: [Chris] “I... I don't know yet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bde
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah. I thought you'd say that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bf4
STRING: [Chris] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c12
STRING: [Torta] “I know that, too. There's still time. I'll practice
with you again if you invite me, and I'll play the recital,
too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c58
STRING: [Torta] “But you have to decide before Natale, okay? I
have to register at the beginning of the year, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c78
STRING: [Chris] “You have to register for vocal courses?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c96
STRING: [Torta] “That's right. Technically it's the beginning of
next year, but I have to practice in the meantime.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cb6
STRING: [Chris] “Got it. I'll decide before then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ce8
STRING: [Torta] “Okay. Well, see you tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cfe
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. I'll ask you again soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d22
STRING: Torta left happily, seemingly not dissatisfied with my
ambiguous answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d38
STRING: I worried whether or not that was a good thing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d44
STRING: But there were still too many things inside me that I
hadn't processed. It would be difficult to decide.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dbc
STRING: [Phorni] “Welcome home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dd2
STRING: Despite how badly I picked on her, Phorni was in good
spirits.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2de8
STRING: She was especially like this whenever Torta visited.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2df4
STRING: Or more to the point, it was rare for someone to visit us,
so she may have simply been happy because of that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e12
STRING: [Phorni] “Now, it's time for Arie's letter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e28
STRING: [Chris] “I'll say this before I start... I don't grin.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e64
STRING: [Phorni] “If you insist, I'll keep a close eye on you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e7a
STRING: [Chris] “No... It's hard to read when you watch me,
please don't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2eac
STRING: [Phorni] “In that case, we're performing an ensemble
like always when you're done.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ec2
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah-yeah. You sure have a lot of energy, even
after singing so much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2efe
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm, I don't know, I've never gotten tired.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f14
STRING: She really was a strange creature.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f20
STRING: [Chris] “Whatever... I'll finish very soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f46
STRING: I took the letter out of the drawer I put it in before, cut
the envelope carefully and removed the letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f5c
STRING: I began reading, slightly worried about what kind of
face I was making.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2faa
STRING: Chris. Is it still raining there?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fbe
STRING: The weather here is nice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fd4
STRING: It would actually be nice to get some rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fe8
STRING: Then I would understand more how you feel, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ffc
STRING: I heard you've been practicing a lot with Torta lately, so
Torta and I both feel better.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x301a
STRING: I was worried that you might pair up with another girl,
or that maybe you would end up with no partner, so I'm
relieved.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3042
STRING: I know the chance of your partner being a girl is half
and half, so I don't have to worry about it so much, but
you know.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x306c
STRING: Just laugh and forgive me for that last worry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3080
STRING: By the way, I unfortunately have something to tell you.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3096
STRING: I wrote about it before, but I'm about to be given more
responsibility. Now even the training of new employees
is left to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30be
STRING: So, since the end of the year is especially busy, I don't
think I can get away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30d2
STRING: I thought I could see you at Natale, but I don't think it
will be possible.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30f0
STRING: It's really unfortunate we can't see each other.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3106
STRING: But you seem busy with the practice for your graduation
recital, Chris, so I'll be patient this time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3124
STRING: When I think about it... Even that need to be patient
will be over soon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3142
STRING: I can't wait for that day to come.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3156
STRING: Until the next letter, then.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3174
STRING: Love, Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31cc
STRING: [Phorni] “What did she say?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31e2
STRING: [Chris] “Nothing special. Same as always.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3214
STRING: [Phorni] “Weird, you looked pretty depressed.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x322a
STRING: [Chris] “Were you watching me...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x325c
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm watching you now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3272
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Arie just said she can't come here. Just
that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32a4
STRING: [Phorni] “I see...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32ba
STRING: Phorni said this regretfully.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32c6
STRING: Even though I couldn't pay attention to her all day when
Arie came, she always looked happy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32dc
STRING: So Phorni really liked Arie, and must've been thinking it
was unfortunate.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32f2
STRING: [Chris] “She's busy. I'll be busy too, so it can't be
helped.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x331a
STRING: [Phorni] “＊sigh＊”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3330
STRING: Phorni seemed to bow her head in thought for a
moment, but then continued as if nothing had
happened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3362
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh well. You should just write your reply for
now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3378
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, you're right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x339c
STRING: That I couldn't see her on Natale.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33a8
STRING: That I thought it was too bad.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33b4
STRING: Also, about Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33c0
STRING: I wrote a simple reply like always, and turned to my
Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33d6
STRING: When I was performing, that was the only time I could
forget.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33e2
STRING: I was certainly tired, but I didn't want to think about it
now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3416
STRING: The letter I wrote ended with this sentence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3422
STRING: “I ended up partnering with Torta. Does that make you
feel a little better, Arie?”
